issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

A customer reported the following issue, when a PDF is viewed in a web view, a UTF8 error occurs.

CODE:::
var infoView = Titanium.UI.createScrollView({

                                            top :               10,
                                            left:               15,
                                            right:              15,
                                            bottom:             -8, 
                                            borderRadius:       appConfig.infoView.borderRadius,
                                            borderColor:        appConfig.infoView.borderColor,
                                            borderWidth:        appConfig.infoView.borderWidth,
                                            backgroundGradient: appConfig.infoView.backgroundGradient,
                                            backgroundColor:    '#FFF',

                                            contentWidth:'auto',
                                            contentHeight:'auto', 
                                            showVerticalScrollIndicator:true,
                                            showHorizontalScrollIndicator:true
                                        });

var webView = Titanium.UI.createWebView({
                                            top :               5,
                                            left:               5,
                                            right:              5,
                                            bottom:             10,  
                                            height:'auto',
                                            url:                "../html/2009_pll_14_akutes_koronarsyndrom.pdf",
                                            backgroundColor:    'transparent',
                                            loading: true
                                        });
infoView.add(webView);                                          
winInfo.add(infoView);
{html}
fields.summary: PDF in webview causes error, iOS 4, sdk 1.4

comments.body:
{html}

Without the pdf, we're unable to recreate. Need a helpdesk ticket or files in order to test.

{html}
Closing this ticket as the request for more information has not been provided.
